alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 1:46PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...AN AREA OF BRIEF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT BIG HORN COUNTY... At 144 PM MST, an area of heavy snow was located near Crow Agency, or 15 miles southeast of Hardin, moving southeast at 35 mph. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Lodge Grass, Crow Agency and Kirby. This includes portions of Interstate 90 from Crow Agency to Lodge Grass. Visibilities are below one quarter of a mile in this area of heavy snow. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn
